channel.title: Supervised Hebbian Learning on Anthony's Blogs

item.title: Supervised Hebbian Learning
item.description: Preliminaries Linear algebra Hebb Rule1 Hebb rule is one of the earliest neural network learning laws. It was published in 1949 by Donald O. Hebb, a Canadian psychologist, in his work ’ The Organization of Behavior’. In this great book, he proposed a possible mechanism for synaptic modification in the brain. And this rule then was used in training the artificial neural networks for pattern recognition. ’ The Organization of Behavior’ The main premise of the book is that behavior could be explained by the action of a neuron.
